data.title: Best Restaurant Management & Hospitality Company
data.meta_description: Riot Hospitality Group, a premier hospitality management company, creates unique experiences with 13 locations in four states, and plans to expand. Exceptional service, entertainment, and community engagement set them apart.
data.text:
Riot Hospitality Group (RHG) is a national, premier hospitality management company headquartered in Scottsdale, Arizona. The company is known for managing and co-creating unique concept brands. It currently oversees 14 locations in Arizona, Colorado, and Tennessee. By the end of 2024, the company will have 18 locations, With a passion for evolving the typical restaurant and entertainment landscape, RHG is committed to creating unique and meaningful experiences for every guest. The company is comprised of people who believe in leading by example, and their passion is fueled by a dedication to customer engagement, philanthropic ties in the community, and a strong commitment to true hospitality.

RHG strives to provide unique social experiences for every patron, feel connected to the neighborhoods that are home to RHG locations, and uphold an impeccable reputation by providing amazing food and drink in truly inviting and electric atmospheres. RHG’s commitment to exceptional service, energetic entertainment, and corporate social responsibly is second to none.

Riot Hospitality Group brands include Cake, Dierks Bentley’s Whiskey Row, El Hefe, Farm & Craft, Hand Cut Chophouse, and Riot House. Additionally, it manages The District, Maya Day and Nightclub, and Clubhouse at Maya. Each brand is unique in its characteristics, setting each one apart, crafting a fantastic guest experience. Employees are carefully selected to represent the best of each brand, bring unmatched passion and the highest standard to the customer service experience.

RHG has been voted the Inc. 5000’s Fastest Growing Hospitality Company in 2018 and has a history of giving back to the community in all ways, shapes, and sizes.
